description: Author Gary Shteyngart tells us three jokes that one old lady told him. He joins us in this episode to read from his new memoir, “Little Failure.”

contentencoded:
Author Gary Shteyngart tells us three jokes that one old lady told him.


He joins us in this episode to read from his new memoir, “Little Failure.”
teaser: Author Gary Shteyngart tells us three jokes that one old lady told him. He joins us in this episode to read from his new memoir, “Little Failure.”
title: “Bad Luck Wife” – Gary Shteyngart
